sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Layout, Menu, Breadcrumb, Icon } from 'antd' const { SubMenu } = Menu const { Header, Content, Sider } = Layout export class SiderLayout extends Component { render() { return ( User } > User List Active Users Blocked Users Expired Users Post } > Post List Recent Posts Banned Posts Warming Posts Comment } > Comment List Recent Comments Old Comments Banned Commnents ) } } export default SiderLayout
